game.name: RaceWorms
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Dig your way through this competitive multiplayer racing game with up to 6 players! RaceWorms can be played online, locally (max. 4 players) or both. Burrow through dynamic maps, leap from the ground to gain a burst of speed, and use items to hinder your opponents.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dig your way through this competitive multiplayer racing game with up to 6 players! RaceWorms can be played online, locally (max. 4 players) or both. Burrow through dynamic maps, leap from the ground to gain a burst of speed, and use items to hinder your opponents.
